game.minigame

Class DiceRolls

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.minigame.Minigame<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>
      • game.minigame.DiceRolls
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DiceRolls
extends Minigame<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>
    Implements the DiceRolls (mini)game as listed in section 3.4 of the specification
    Version:
    1.0, 2.0 Added exception Error if doTurn() is called on a game that has already finished Added isolated tests in main()
    Author:
    jesse, jesse
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
